title: Friend Folder
body: I created a friend folder and would like to sort my IRL friends from my online friends, however I can only put people who are currently online in league into these friend folders, I think it may be a bug seeing as no option comes up to move the offline players into groups I have created

replies.body:
That's strange, I just tried now and it's working for me.

https://i.gyazo.com/0e4e933cd7e86569b76338366a99c370.png

Can you take me through what you're doing exactly? You're clicking and dragging them into the new folder right?

I can drag and move the online players, but anyone that is offline I am unable to move, also with the online players when I right click on their name I have the option to move them to a seperate folder but I do not get that option with offline players

Yeah that is weird, when I right-click offline friends and the "MOVE" option is there.

The only thing I can recommend for this is a full repair unfortunately. It takes a while, but if you leave it going while you go out for a bit it shouldn't be too inconvenient.

I can drag and move the online players, but anyone that is offline I am unable to move, also with the online players when I right click on their name I have the option to move them to a seperate folder but I do not get that option with offline players
